title: Noam Chomsky Interview on CBC (Part 1 of 2)
description:
Evan Solomon talks with Noam Chomsky about his book "Hegemony or Survival: America's Quest for Global Dominance". The show is Hot Type on CBC.

Here is a more recent talk by Chomsky (Apr 2010): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qy9SmbFb0Q0

Broadcast date: December 9, 2003.
